venue.name: The American Legion: Nonatum Post No 440

item.description:
The Italian folk dance group"Ricordi d'Italia" will present its 33rd Annual Carnevale Dinner & Dance event, which includes performances of multi-regional Italian folk music and traditional dances.  Plus, you will enjoy an authentic  4-course Italian dinner, and dancing to the music of ‘The Ambrosiani Band’.

http://www.ricordiditalia.com/Carnevale_Dinner2011.pdf

Ricordi d' Italia Folk Dance group:

http://www.ricordiditalia.com/Carnevale_Dinner2011.pdf

http://www.myspace.com/ricordiditalia

Tickets are $50 each, which includes all evening activities, 4 course meal, and wine with dinner (full description below).

To purchase tickets, you may contact:

Michael Vivaldi at 781-246-1516 or by email: mvivaldi_1971@yahoo.com

You can pay him for the tickets via PayPal, or by mailing him a personal check.

Michael's Italian group profile:

http://www.meetup.com/easternmassitalian/members/11029324/

 
* If you RSVP "Yes", please plan to pay Michael for the ticket within the following two days.
 
Ticket price includes:

*  Cocktails and appetizers at 6:30pm.  Dinner is at 7:00pm. which includes a sit down meal with water, wine, bread, 4-course meal, coffee, and tea.  Also there is a full cash-bar available.   The 4-course meal generally consists of a pasta plate, salad, entree with meat and vegetable, and a desert.

*   The dancing and singing is performed by the folk group - 'Ricordi d'Italia' in traditional costume of Carnevale.  Afterward, the dance floor will be opened to all attendees to dance and mingle to the music of the "Ambrosiani Band".  The link to the Ambrosiani Band is:   http://www.myspace.com/ambrosiani

*  150-200 parking spaces are available for attendees. 


*   The event generally attracts 225 people, but there have been times in the past with 275-300 attendees.


If we can get a group of 10 people together we can reserve our own table.
 
Good people and good times!

We hope you can join us for dinner, dancing and a lot of fun!!!

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Carnevale Dinner - Dance
